title: Unepic (Latest With 1.49.2 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest version of "Unepic". It contains the 1.49 Patch. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


-------------------


Changelog for version 1.49.02:

- new (SP): spell Unholly Growth (arcane level 14).


- new (SP): tutorial for weapon-base skills and Kill Points.

- new (SP): Gualix explains what are Unepic Credits and how to earn them.

- new: Included a test grid for the calibration of the controller.

- fixed: Game crashed when sorting spells and you got > 100 spells.

- fixed (SP): The game no longer crashes when at the end of the game the
second character dies.

- fixed: Dialogs no longer sounds when sound is muted.

- fixed: Shorcut info of "tremor" was displayed wrong.

- fixed: When leaving inventory, the last item focused was kept in the
item info panel.

- fixed: sometimes mobs got blocked jumping and falling constantly from
a platform.

- fixed: fireball wand works again

- fixed: "for the watch" sentence for removing character was not reset
once you wrote it.

- fixed: some controllers were not detected/working.


--------------------

http://www.gog.com/game/unepic" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.gog.com/game/unepic</a>
